name: Napa Cabbage Kimchi (Tongbaechu-kimchi)
ingredients: ½ cup Kosher salt (2.5 ounces: 72 grams)
2 tablespoons sweet rice flour (glutinous rice flour)
2 tablespoons Turbinado sugar (or brown or white sugar)
2 cups Korean radish matchsticks (or daikon radish)
1 cup chopped Asian chives (buchu), optional (substitute with 3 green onions, chopped)
½ cup garlic cloves (24 garlic cloves), minced
¼ cup fermented salted shrimp (saeujeot) with the salty brine, chopped
utensils: Mason jar or onggi for fermentation

instructions.en: Trim the cores of the napa cabbage if they stick out too much. Cut a slit in the base of the cabbage to split it in half without shredding the leaves.
instructions.sk: Orezajte jadrá napa kapusty, ak príliš vyčnievajú. Urobte zárez na spodnej časti kapusty, aby ste ju rozdelili na polovicu bez roztrhnutia listov.
instructions.ja: ナパキャベツの芯が出すぎている場合は、切り取ります。キャベツの底に切れ目を入れて、葉を傷めずに半分に分けます。

instructions.en: Cut a slit through the core of each half, 2 inches above the stem. Dunk the halves in a basin of water and sprinkle salt between the leaves.
instructions.sk: Urobte zárez cez jadro každej polovice, 2 palce nad stonkou. Ponorte polovice do nádoby s vodou a posypte soľ medzi listy.
instructions.ja: 各半分の芯に2インチの切れ目を入れます。半分を水の入った大きなボウルに浸し、葉の間に塩を振りかけます。

instructions.en: Let the cabbages rest for 2 hours, turning them every 30 minutes. After 2 hours, wash the cabbage halves under cold running water and drain.
instructions.sk: Nechajte kapustu odpočívať 2 hodiny, každých 30 minút ju otočte. Po 2 hodinách umyte polovice kapusty pod studenou tečúcou vodou a sceďte.
instructions.ja: キャベツを2時間休ませ、30分ごとにひっくり返します。2時間後、キャベツの半分を冷水で洗い、排水します。

instructions.en: While the cabbage is salting, make the porridge by combining water and sweet rice flour in a small pot. Cook over medium heat until it starts to bubble, then add sugar and cook for 1 more minute.
instructions.sk: Kým sa kapusta solí, pripravte kašu zmiešaním vody a sladkej ryžovej múky v malom hrnci. Varíme na strednom ohni, kým nezačne bublinkovať, potom pridajte cukor a varte ešte 1 minútu.
instructions.ja: キャベツが塩漬けされている間、小鍋に水と甘い米粉を混ぜてお粥を作ります。中火で泡立ち始めるまで加熱し、砂糖を加えてさらに1分間調理します。

instructions.en: Pour cooled porridge into a large mixing bowl. Add garlic, ginger, onion, fish sauce, fermented salted shrimp, and hot pepper flakes. Mix well until it turns into a thin paste.
instructions.sk: Ochladenú kašu nalejte do veľkej miešacej misy. Pridajte cesnak, zázvor, cibuľu, rybaciu omáčku, fermentované slané krevety a čili vločky. Dobre premiešajte, kým sa nezmení na tenkú pastu.
instructions.ja: 冷却したお粥を大きなボウルに注ぎます。ニンニク、ショウガ、玉ねぎ、魚醤、発酵した塩漬けエビ、唐辛子フレークを加えます。薄いペーストになるまでよく混ぜます。

instructions.en: Add the radish, carrot, and green onion, plus the Asian chives and water dropwort if using. Mix well.
instructions.sk: Pridajte reďkovku, mrkvu a zelenú cibuľu, plus ázijské pažítky a vodný dropwort, ak používate. Dobre premiešajte.
instructions.ja: 大根、ニンジン、ネギ、アジアのチャイブ、水のドロップワートを加えます（使用する場合）。よく混ぜます。

instructions.en: Spread some kimchi paste on each cabbage leaf. Wrap each leaf around itself into a small packet and place into your jar or container.
instructions.sk: Na každý list kapusty rozotrite trochu kimchi pasty. Zabalte každý list do seba do malého balíčka a vložte do pohára alebo nádoby.
instructions.ja: 各キャベツの葉にキムチペーストを広げます。各葉を小さなパケットに巻き、瓶や容器に入れます。

instructions.en: Let the kimchi sit at room temperature for a day or two to ferment, then store in the refrigerator.
instructions.sk: Nechajte kimchi stáť pri izbovej teplote jeden alebo dva dni na fermentáciu, potom ho uložte do chladničky.
instructions.ja: キムチを室温で1〜2日間発酵させ、その後冷蔵庫に保存します。

notes: The kimchi will ferment faster in warmer temperatures. Store in the refrigerator to slow down fermentation.
